title: Sitka National Historical Park: Education
body: Sitka: A Natural and Cultural Wonderland Gaze at towering totems, explore historic buildings or observe nature at its wildest; Sitka National Historical Park can act as an engaging park as a classroom for your students. Schedule a guest speaker and we can come to your classroom. If learning from a distance is the best way to connect to the park, then check out the park's distance learning resources. Or discover how you can combine your love of teaching with the beauty of Alaska on our professional development webpage. Read more >>                  Exploring a Watery World The Indian River is the heart of the Park.  Learn more about how the park protects critical habitat for salmon, eagles and brown bears. Read More        Guided Walks in the Park Join a park ranger for a walk in YOUR national park! View Sitka's Park Calendar to see what events are coming up for this week! Read More        Discover Sitka from Your Classroom If you can't bring your students to Sitka National Historical Park, the park's distance learning resources can bring Sika to you! Read More
